itemDescription: celebrity deaf chef, television presenter and social media entertainer

wikipedia_page.main: Scott Garthwaite (born 22 January 1980) also known as Punk Chef is a professional celebrity deaf chef and television presenter from the North East of England, United Kingdom. He is also known for his on-screen personality with flamboyant vibrant hot pink hairstyle working for BSL Zone and BBC cooking programmes.

response: * Punk Chef, celebrity deaf chef from the UK
